lead_paragraph: A Georgia police officer's body armor failed to stop bullets from piercing his back, killing him as he worked an off-duty security job, his widow alleges in a federal lawsuit.

headline.main: Widow of Slain Officer: Body Armor Failed to Stop Bullets
headline.print_headline: Widow of Slain Officer: Body Armor Failed to Stop Bullets

snippet: A Georgia police officer's body armor failed to stop bullets from piercing his back, killing him as he worked an off-duty security job, his widow alleges in a federal lawsuit....
